alert.note: Alert for Okmulgee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 11:27AM CDT until May 13 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Okmulgee County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until noon CDT. * At 1127 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Okmulgee State Park, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Okmulgee... Beggs... Bald Hill... Preston... Okmulgee State Park... Liberty... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
